errors.testsFailed: The test suite failed. Please, check the console output for more details.
errors.invalidFormat: Output of test script has invalid format. Check [documentation](https://github.com/ArtiomTr/jest-coverage-report-action#jest-coverage-report-) for more details.
errors.tooSmallCoverage: Total coverage is too small. Current coverage is {{ currentCoverage }}, but it should be at least {{ coverageThreshold }}.
errors.unknownError: Something went wrong. If this is an issue of jest-coverage-report-action, please report about it [here](https://github.com/ArtiomTr/jest-coverage-report-action/issues/new).
